title: Set Up Automatic EFT Payments
description: A customer wants to have their monthly premium automatically deducted from their checking account.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and their policy.
Securely collect the customer's bank routing and account number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the bank account information.

tasks.description: Set up the recurring EFT payment plan and confirm the first withdrawal date with the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets up the automated payment and informs the customer of the start date.
